translations.translation: and Thamud who carved out rocks in the valley-side,
And with Thamud who carved rocks in the valley;
And how did He deal with Thamud who hewed out rocks in the valley?
(Also consider how He dealt with) the Thamud, who carved their houses out of the rocks in the valley.
And the tribe of Thamud, who hewed rocks in the valley.
And Thamud, who hewed out rocks in the valley
And (with) Samood, who hewed out the rocks in the valley,
and Thamood, who hollowed the rocks in the valley,
And with (the tribe of) Thamud, who clove the rocks in the valley;
and with the Thamud, who cut out [huge] rocks in the valley,
And With Thamud who hewed out rocks in the vale,
and [the people of] Thamud, who hollowed out the rocks in the valley,
And with the Thamud (people), who cut out (huge) rocks in the valley?-
And (with) Thamud (people), who cut (hewed) out rocks in the valley (to make dwellings)?
And Thamood, who hewed out the rocks of the valley?
And Thamood—those who carved the rocks in the valley.
And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?
[89:9] and Thamūd, who hollowed, hewed, the rocks (sakhr is the plural of sakhra) in the valley, the Wādī al-Qurā, [rocks] which they used as dwellings,
(And with (the tribe of) Thamud) He says: and how He destroyed Thamud, the people of Salih, (who clove the rocks in the valley) of Qura;

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُواْ ٱلصَّخْرَ بِٱلْوَادِ } معناه نَقَّبوا

translations.translation: And His saying - Exalted is He - {And Thamud, who carved out the rock in the valley} means that they passed by.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
فأهلكهم سبحانه واستأصلهم بعدما أفرطوا في أطوارهم الخارجة عن حد الاعتدال { وَثَمُودَ } يعني: كيف فعل بثمود أيضاً ما فعل من الهلاك
 مع أنهم { ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُواْ } قطعوا ونقبوا { ٱلصَّخْرَ } أي: صخور الجبال { بِٱلْوَادِ } [الفجر: 9] أي: بواد القرى
 واتخذوا فيها بلاداً حصينة منيعة من شدة قدرتهم وقوتهم
 مع ذلك أهلكهم سبحانه
